root.Summary: 1: Lin KY, Ye H, Han BW, Wang WT, Wei PP, He B, Li XJ, Chen YQ. Genome-widescreen identified let-7c/miR-99a/miR-125b regulating tumor progression andstem-like properties in cholangiocarcinoma. Oncogene. 2015 Oct 12. doi:10.1038/onc.2015.396.
